name: mytechgear
description: MyTechGear - Monorepo pour frontend React et backend Express

scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:server && npm run install:client
scripts.migrate: cd server && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf client/node_modules && rm -rf server/node_modules
